Author: DashielQuinn
EnhancedContent: Every time I set it to focus, as soon as I exit the settings interface, it automatically switches back to the image. I tried deleting the settings, but it didn't work. Does anyone know what's going on?
Title: The lock screen interface of the Windows 11 system cannot be changed.
Description: Every time I set it to focus, as soon as I exit the settings interface, it automatically switches back to the image. I tried deleting the settings, but it didn't work. Does anyone know what's going on?
